title: The Homicide Report
content:
Daniel Sevilla, a 21-year-old Asian man, was fatally shot Wednesday, Jan. 25, in the 1300 block of Wesley Drive in Long Beach, according to Los Angeles County coroner’s records.
About 2 a.m., Long Beach police responded to call about a shooting in the area, according to a news release. Upon arriving, officers found Sevilla with several gunshot wounds. He was later pronounced dead at the scene at 2:37 a.m., according to coroner’s records.
The attacker fled the scene before officers arrived, and a motive has not yet been determined. However, the incident does not appear to be random, the news release said.
Anyone with information can call Long Beach police at (562) 570-7244. Those wishing to remain anonymous can call Crime Stoppers at (800) 222-8477.
